Granville Bates https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Granville_Bates 0 Granville Bates (January 7, 1882 – July 8, 1940) was an American character actor and bit player, appearing in over ninety films. Granville_Bates ( January_7_,_1882 – July_8_,_1940 ) was an_American_character_actor_and_bit_player , appearing in over_ninety_films .
